tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second for LiveLabs. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: JSON Collection Tables
tutorials.description: Learn how to create and use JSON Collection tables for storing and querying JSON documents in Oracle Database 23ai.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: JSON Duality Views
tutorials.description: Explore JSON Duality views to access the same data through both relational and JSON interfaces.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
